name: Vôo dos gansos - Flight of the Geese
name_original: Vôo dos gansos - Flight of the Geese
description:
PixelArt illustrations for the game: "Vôo dos gansos" (Flight of the Geese).

The game was developed as a team during a Game Jam in July 2015.

The theme of this GameJam was "Union".

Briefing:

The game consists of controlling a goose and its formation during their migration to the South.

During the journey he meets other geese to enter the formation.

Among the geese there is no leader, all are leaders.

Diverting from some enemies during the course,

the player will manage the fatigue of the leader,

taking turns with another goose with more energy and disposition.

To play, go to:

http://www.perametade.com/ptta-portfolio/voo-dos-gansos/

This game is in beta if you find any errors,

leave your opinion and comment about what you found on the facebook page:

https://www.facebook.com/PixFrontier-1384761718490119

Interview with team "Pixfrontier":

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Wc8JygwSdPc

Game Jam Information:

http://producaodejogos.com/
